turns.speaker: user

turns.speaker: agent

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Sure, it's John Smith, and my birthday is June 10, 1980. But honestly, this is already frustrating. Why do you need my birthday *again*? I gave it to the receptionist last time.

turns.speaker: user

turns.speaker: agent
